user.title: Set up Oz Poll
user.description:
Get Australian pollen forecast data for your Home Assistant.

üåø **Basic Setup (Free):**
Provide the pollen forecast website URL.
Example: https://www.melbournepollen.com.au/

‚≠ê **Premium Setup (Paid Subscription):**
Check the premium box and provide both the website URL and your API URL.
Example API: https://api.pollenforecast.com.au/app/json/data_acquisition.php?type=1&version=4&site_id=1

Premium features include detailed 7-day forecasts and additional pollen type data.
